item.title: Notes on Paxos Made Simple
item.description: Origin paper link Problem safety requirements Only a value that has been proposed may be chosen Only a single value is chosen, and A process never learns that a value has been chosen unless it acutally has been three agents: proposers(P), acceptors(A), and learners(L). use customary asynchronous, non-Byzantine model, in which: Agents operate at arbitrary speed, may fail by stopping, and may restart Messages can take arbitrarily long to be delivered, can be duplicated, and can be lost, but they are not corrupted.
